caption.p: Avian influenza virus prevalence and hemagglutinin subtype (H) distribution of 871 first-year black-headed gulls sampled on the colony site of Griend during 2008â€“2010. Bars indicate virus prevalence (no. PCR-positive samples/no. sampled per week). Black bar sections, H13; gray bar sections, H16; white bar sections, unknown H subtype.
